title: Urbanization in Tanzania 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 33.05 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 26.78 was reached at Year 2008
min_summary: In general Share of urban population in total population has rose over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2017.
